title: CEO of Jeff Bezos’s Blue Origin rocket company resigns
description: Bob Smith, the chief executive of Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin, announced to staff in an email that he was resigning Monday.

title: ChatGPT can talk now, threatening Alexa and Siri
description: OpenAI’s ChatGPT is now able to speak back to users, putting it on a collision course with Google, Apple and Amazon in the battle to create smarter voice assistants.

title: The new phone call etiquette: Text first and never leave a voice mail
description: The rules for phone calls have changed. Here are the basics on when and how to make a phone call, and why you should think twice before leaving that voice mail.
